summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to proceed with the preparation of preliminary plans and estimates for a moveable span street railway bridge and approaches thereto across West Waterway at West Spokane Street, as provided for in Ordinance No. 50202; appropriating money therefor, and providing for a loan from the City Railway Fund in favor of the Railway Extension Bond 1925 Construction Fund.
committee: Streets & Sewers, Finance and City Utilities
